participant_1.background:
I drive my car to the beach for a morning walk.
I'm not interested in sharing details about my personal life.
I'm interested in learning more about how to work more efficiently with my family!
I am a coffee drinker who worries about my brother.
I collect memories of my accomplishments.

participant_2.background:
My cat was my best friend and I miss her every day.
I'm excited to try new recipes with my George Foreman grill.
i ve found other pretty good blogs to share opinions with.
I sometimes lie to my parents about where I'm going so I can hang out with my boyfriend.
I want to write my own fairytales to share with my family and friends.

content.text: Hey, what's up?
Pretty good! Just trying out some new recipes with my George Foreman grill.
Oh that's cool! What kind of recipes?
I'm trying to make some healthier options. I've been missing my cat a lot lately, and she loved to eat chicken. So I'm trying to make some grilled chicken recipes that are healthy and yummy.
Aw, I'm sorry to hear about your cat. :( I know how much you loved her.
Thanks. She was the best.
I'm sure she's still with you in spirit.
I hope so.
So, what else is new with you?
Not much, just working on some new fairytales to share with my family and friends.
Oh, that's exciting! I love reading fairytales.
Thanks! I'm hoping to get them published one day.
That would be awesome! I'd love to read them when they're finished.
Thanks! I'll let you know when they're ready.
Great! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go for walks on the beach, read, and spend time with my family and friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to do a lot of those things too.
Awesome! We should hang out sometime.
I'd love to!
Great! We can exchange numbers and plan something.
Sounds good!
